question: Which word means to attract and hold the interest and attention of someone?
Which word refers to the faculty or activity of imagining things, especially things that are impossible or improbable?
Which word means to pay attention to or take notice of something?
Which phrase means to be equal to something in quantity or effect?
Which phrase means to be unwilling or disinclined to do something?
Which phrase means to be unable to do something?
Which word means very complicated or detailed?
Which phrase means to dismiss someone or something as insignificant or a failure?
Which word means a confident and forceful statement of fact or belief?
Which word means the quality of being over-confident or having an exaggerated sense of one's own importance or abilities?
Which phrase means to dedicate something, especially time, effort, or resources, to a particular purpose or person?
Which word means to produce something by assembling information collected from other sources?
Which word refers to notice or attention given to someone or something by the media?
Which word means inspiring great affection or delight; charming and lovable?
Which phrase refers to the system of organs and structures used in producing speech sounds?
Which word means awkward in movement or handling things?
Which word means complete and total, not limited in any way?
Which word refers to a fence or other obstacle that prevents movement or access?
Which word means the learning or developing of a skill, habit, or quality?
